name: Battleship Duel
description:
Battleship Duel is a game in which you and another player are fighting with battleships to defeat each other. You and the other play have 7 hitpoints, but be careful because bullets you shoot can bounce back and cause damage to yourself. You can only move side to side with your battleship, so come up with a strategy to dodge and juke your opponent and his or her bullets while shooting him or her. Good luck!

Controls:

Player 1:

  • A and D to move
  • W or S to shoot

Player 2: 

  • J and L to move
  • I or K to shoot

Game:

  • Spacebar to reset (only after someone has died)
  • Scroll wheel to change the music
